pr_title: Make reserved space on directories only when required

timeline.message: Reserve space on directories only when required

timeline.bodyText: Should we reserve the total tier reserve bytes in each directory in the tier?
timeline.author: calvinjia

replies.bodyText:
This is indeed per-dir reserved bytes.
There is no total reserved bytes defined since we want to be able to make progress on each directory.
replies.author: ggezer
